mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NAME,BOARD_IDX,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONT,USER_ID,USER_NAME,DATE_FORMAT(BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE,BOARD_READCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NAME='mission' ORDER BY BOARD_IDX DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_READCOUNT=BOARD_READCOUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_IDX=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_IDX as BOARD_IDX, b.BOARD_TITLE as BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONT as BOARD_CONT, b.USER_ID AS USER_ID, b.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(b.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, b.BOARD_READCOUNT AS BOARD_READCOUNT, f.SFILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME FROM BOARD b left outer join BOARD_FILES f on b.BOARD_IDX = f.BOARD_IDX WHERE b.BOARD_IDX = #{idx}
SELECT MAX(BOARD_IDX) AS maxIdx, MIN(BOARD_IDX) AS minIdx FROM BOARD
SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{nextIdx}
SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{prevIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (BOARD_NAME,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONT, USER_ID,USER_NAME, BOARD_REGDATE) values(#{board_name},#{board_title}, #{board_cont}, #{user_id},#{user_name}, now())
insert into BOARD_FILES (FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, SFILE_NAME, BOARD_IDX) values(#{file_name}, #{file_ext}, #{sfile_name}, #{board_idx})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_IDX=#{board_idx} AND USER_ID=#{user_id}
